name: Nike Dart 10 Womens
description: Offering a soft step on the street, track or trail, the Nike Dart 10 is comfortable and versatile. Mesh upper combines with a lightweight, molded midfoot to provide ideal breathability and all-purpose support, keeping your feet cool and dry while stabilizing your run. The full-length Reslon midsole foam cushions your step, absorbing shock and adding bounce to your stride. To handle a variety of terrains, this running shoe features a combination outsole pattern, which offers optimal traction and long-lasting durability. Wt. 8.6 oz.
category: running shoes womens row1 apparel best price

name: Nike Dart 10 Mens
description: Offering a soft step on the street, track, or trail, the Nike Dart 10 is comfortable and versatile. Mesh upper promotes airflow. Full-length Reslon midsole foam cushions your step, absorbing shock and adding bounce to your stride. Combination outsole pattern offers optimal traction on a variety of terrain. Wt. 10.2 oz.
category: running shoes mens row1 apparel best price

name: Adidas Originals T ZXZ 700 Mens
description: Featuring a throwback running design, the adidas Originals T-ZXZ 700 offers a classic athletic look for everyday wear. It's made with a PU-coated leather upper with mesh underlays for a durable fit. An EVA midsole and iced rubber outsole sit below for comfort and traction.

name: New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Womens
description: Stay fueled for the open road with New Balance's 980, a shoe that enhances your energy with the luxury of soft and plush cushioning to keep you going mile after mile. Features the performance midsole compound Fresh Foam that delivers a lower, more natural underfoot feel. No-sew air mesh with welded overlays for breathability to keep your feet feeling fresh. Blown rubber outsole for added cushioning, traction, and durability. Wt. 7.3 oz.

name: Under Armour SpeedForm Apollo Womens
description: Seamless heel cup with silicone grip for a locked-in, anatomical fit. Smooth, ultrasonic welded seaming with Bemis tape for next-to-skin support and comfort. Perforated toe with ultrasonic seal for durable breathability. Full-length Micro G® midsole creates an incredibly lightweight and responsive ride. TPU shank at midfoot for extra support and stability. Full-length 4D Foam® sock liner conforms to your foot's exact shape, eliminating slippage. Anatomical outsole for natural fit and performance. Updated molded toe detail. Color blocking on heel with matching laces. Offset: 8mm. Weight: 6.5 oz.

name: New Balance 1260v4 Mens
description: For consistent support through any run, look no further than the New Balance 1260 V4. Lightweight, open mesh upper with wrapping synthetic overlays provides a breathable and secure fit. N2 low-to-the-ground cushioning midsole technology is a responsive, durable, sustainable cushioning system in a low-profile execution.

name: Adidas Supernova Glide 6 Boost Womens
description: Textile BoostTM Midsole - Has an amazingly bouncy feel without being too soft, and that makes for a light, fast run. TORSION SYSTEM - For midfoot integrity throughout the footstrike. Continental Rubber Outsole - For superb grip, more durable and longer lasting mileage. Seamless Upper - This lightweight and breathable material provides supportive, skin-like fit. Redesigned Upper - This newly designed upper allows for increased movement and added ventilation, keeping your feet cool and dry.

name: Saucony Guide 7 Womens
description: 6 available colors, synthetic and nylon upper, rubber sole, HydraMAX moisture-wicking collar, ComfortLite sockliner, HRC+ strobel board, and PowerGrid full-length cushioning.

name: New Balance Women's WT610 Trail Running Shoe
description: Synthetic. Made in the USA and Imported. Manmade sole. Acteva lite midsole. EVA foam sockliner. 12mm heel-to-toe drop. AT tread outsole. Aggressive tread and lightweight cushioning combine for an agile, trail-ready ride.

name: Saucony Omni 13 Mens
description: Advanced stability for even the most severe overpronator in one lightweight package. Breathable mesh upper with no-sew overlays for flexibility and reduced hot spots. Lightweight stretch Arch-Lock material in the arch area creates a snug, supportive fit. Support Frame technology locks down the heel throughout the gait cycle.

name: New Balance 574 Womens
description: The New Balance 574 never goes out of style with its clean lines and impressive cushioning. Leather, suede, or textile upper offers a range of styles. ENCAP®technology in the midsole combines EVA and polyurethane to provide cushioning, stability, and flexibility. Carbon rubber outsole provides durable traction.

name: Nike Free 4.0 Flyknit Mens
description: Combining Nike Free flexibility with the engineered support and breathability of Nike Flyknit technology, the Nike Free 4.0 Flyknit is a conglomerate of comfort.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 31 Mens
description: The quickest, most responsive Pegasus yet, the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 31 Men's Running Shoe improves upon its legendary tradition with updated Nike Zoom Air cushioning, a lightweight yet supportive mesh upper and a lowered offset groomed for speed.

name: Puma Voltaic 5 Mens
description: The PUMA Voltaic 5 puts a new upper on the classic design.This version features an air mesh upper with heat-cut molded layers and a matte finish.Sits on a TPU shank midsole.Rubber outsole for traction that is great for the gym or the street.

name: Precis Petite Pea Coat, Scarlet
description: This striking statement coat from Precis Petite will insert a burst of colour into your wardrobe. It features a gorgeous wide colour, bold buttons across the front and pretty side pockets. The delicate pleating at the waist will flatter your silhouette and the short style means it will work great against dark coloured jeans and smart court shoes. Length Short. Material 70% wool, 20% polyamide, 10% cashmere. Neckline Collar. Sleeve Long Sleeve. Washing Instructions Dry clean.

name: Kelsi Dagger Ontario Suede Wedge Platform Bootie
description: Kelsi Dagger suede upper. Lace-up vamp. Round toe. Synthetic lining and sole. 3 in wedge heel. .5 in platform. 3.5in shaft height. 'Ontario' is imported.

name: ASOS Oversize Boyfriend Watch
description: This boyfriend watch is made by ASOS Collection. The details include: a chunky bezel with three stem detailing, notched indices and chronograph sub-dial detailing to the face, triple hand quartz movement and a bracelet strap with a deployment clasp fastening. ABOUT ME 98% Alloy, 2% Glass.

name: Vintage Sun Earrings
description: Gold plated earrings from Vintage featuring a a striped black glass stone with sun centre and a clip on back. Please note that vintage items are not new and therefore might have minor imperfections.

name: H&M Tube scarf
description: Knitted tube scarf. 35% polyamide, 50% acrylic, 15% wool. Machine wash at 30˚.

name: Quilted Cross-Body Bag
description: Quilted faux leather cross body bag with intertwined chain long strap. Front flap with twist clasp fastening.
